issue.title: s.taobao.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://s.taobao.com/search?commend=all&ie=utf8&initiative_id=tbindexz_20170306&q=%E9%AB%98%E7%B2%BE%E5%BA%A6%E6%B5%B7%E6%B0%B4%E6%B0%B4%E8%B4%A8%E7%9B%91%E6%B5%8B%E4%BB%AA&search_type=item&sourceId=tb.index&spm=a21bo.jianhua.201856-taobao-item.2&ssid=s5-e](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fs.taobao.com%2Fsearch%3Fcommend%3Dall%26ie%3Dutf8%26initiative_id%3Dtbindexz_20170306%26q%3D%25E9%25AB%2598%25E7%25B2%25BE%25E5%25BA%25A6%25E6%25B5%25B7%25E6%25B0%25B4%25E6%25B0%25B4%25E8%25B4%25A8%25E7%259B%2591%25E6%25B5%258B%25E4%25BB%25AA%26search_type%3Ditem%26sourceId%3Dtb.index%26spm%3Da21bo.jianhua.201856-taobao-item.2%26ssid%3Ds5-e) ### Comment > 搜索任意商品，在列表前几个总是存在广告,并且用广告字样表示，之后才是正常商品，右侧列表同样也都是广告商品,同样广告字样表示 Username: `@ThingsWhy` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/bw491eeflhs8s8c400ggg4scw8g80ws1m3agur5xq9.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fbhp29gmie0cco84wo00wckcc0kc4g4q4u9xa94qg0.png?nc=1)

issue.title: aniwave.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://aniwave.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faniwave.to) ### Comment > This happens when upon entering the site and tapping the ‘Go to Homepage’ button, it will open another site that is similar to the site itself. Though this happens at least once when you are not using the your device for hours and the issue will not reappear until tomorrow, but the fact that upon tapping the in-site button will open and send you to another site is very annoying. > > Is there any AdGuard filter that I should have enabled or is this a AdGuard filter that needs updating? > > Let me know when there is an update. Username: `@Ian Chen` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/r1mqmi5j73ko8gw4gscsgosw08sow88eghmpfyzzbs.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.1 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`, `Default`, `(Regular)`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/dns/filter_1_ios.txt` Filters: | Ad Blocking:

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [http://aniwave.to](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Faniwave.to) ### Comment > This in-site redirect issue occurs at least once everyday. Sure it will go away for a while until the the next day, but the fact that this happens every once a day is very annoying as tapping the ‘Go to Homepage’ button or tapping any of the episodes that you want to watch will randomly open another site when you least expect it. > > But the fact it’s getting past some AdGuard filters that specifically made to block and prevent in-site redirects is noticeable. So please update the AdGuard filters that are made specifically for blocking and preventing in-site redirects or just redirects in general. Username: `@Ian Chen` ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1m89rri2lrr4404sg40kc0404so8k40h209qz4tdqo.jpg?nc=1)
